log.clientError: The Discord client WebSocket encountered a connection error.
log.dblServerCountPosted: Server count posted to Discord Bot List!
log.dblError: An error occured with Discord Bot List.
log.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check that you've placed the correct Discord bot token in the config file.
log.serverConnected: '{SERVER_NAME}' ({SERVER_ID}) connected! There are now {SERVER_COUNT} connected servers.
log.serverDisconnected: '{SERVER_NAME}' ({SERVER_ID}) disconnected. There are now {SERVER_COUNT} connected servers.
